content: You Can Now Take Moz Academy Courses for Free Moz News By: Roger MozBot March 24, 2020 Table of Contents Copied! By: Roger MozBot March 24, 2020 You Can Now Take Moz Academy Courses for Free Moz News Please note: the free Moz Academy promotion is no longer available. The promo code will no longer provide free access to our course catalogue. You’re still welcome to purchase any of our courses on our academy here. The well-being of our community — from our customers to our readers to our team members — is of the utmost importance to us here at Moz. The ongoing situation around the spread of COVID-19 is ever-changing. Many of you are experiencing the impact of this pandemic, and we want to address the difficulties you’re facing and acknowledge how you might be feeling. The state of the world and current events bring significant, often crushing, impact to businesses large and small. While it can be really hard to focus on work and on what is happening in the SEO industry during this difficult time, we also know that your work can’t stop. Whether you’re reading this as a small business owner concerned about your traffic, or an agency with clients who are hurting financially — we’re here to support you. Today through May 31, you’ll be able to access the courses in Moz Academy for free. Hopefully you can use this resource to level up your skills, learn a new discipline, or simply channel your energy into a productive distraction. There's something for everyone: SEO FundamentalsLocal SEO FundamentalsKeyword ResearchPage OptimizationBacklink BasicsReporting on SEOTechnical SEO Site AuditBacklink Audit & RemovalThe Fundamentals of SEO Client ProspectingFinding Potential SEO ClientsPrepare for the SEO Client PitchSelling the Value of SEOClient OnboardingHow to Use Moz Pro We love you, we’re here for you, and we’re in this together. This promotion ended May 31, 2020. If you’re interested in purchasing courses and you're already a Moz customer or community member, you can head straight to academy.moz.com. If you’re not a Moz customer or community member, simply create a free account with us to get started. Copied! Back to Top
